subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kansas gave Coach Mark Mangino a raise and extended his contract two years, amending his deal to increase his compensation to $2.3 million a year. The contract runs through 2012. Mangino was The Associated Press Coach of the Year last season. The Jayhawks went 12-1, including a 24-21 victory over Virginia Tech in the Orange Bowl.
